page.title: 19RECREATION
page.content: There are many{footpaths}and green lanes for people who like to enjoy the beauty of the countryside. The{public {houses}are The Half-Moon on Cole Green The Cherry Tree at Knowle Green, both thatched and the Plough where the Morris Dance team meets.There are two hard{tennis}courts at the Community House used by a club and the public. There is a{football}pitch,{netball court, pavilion and childrens' play equipment on the{playing field.}There are three private swimming pools, the nearest public{pools}are in Sudbury, Haverhill & Halstead.There is a {gliding}club on the old airfield.The nearest{cinema}is in Halstead. Many people visit Sports Centres in nearby towns. Many people relax with T.V. and videos at home. Gardening and D.I.Y. are also popular. There are regular {Discos}in the village for young people
